extendedInfo.description: The world's most popular horoscopes are now available on the Android Tablet!Coming off the success of dailyhoroscope.com's already popular iGoogle gadget, our newest and brightest offering takes you to a whole new immersive level, delivering daily horoscopes from our celebrity astrologers Rick Levine and Jeff Jawer. Cosmic profile stats allow you to experience horoscopes with pinpoint astrological accuracy. The easy-to-use interface, the bold and beautiful design and the fun social features will make reading your horoscope a more powerful and fulfilling daily experience. Youâll never be caught off-guard again thanks to this daily dose of insight and advice.Features:- âCompatibility Resultsâ feature will show you how well you gel with your friends, astrologically speaking!- Exclusive âKarma Meter (TM)â offers a new way to balance out your karma- Daily Planet Pulse Video Horoscope by Rick Levine & Jeff Jawer changes every day- Cosmic Profile for pinpoint astrological accuracy- Moon phases updated daily- Interactive, animated and visually stimulating- Use of full screen view allows for optimal user experience- Promotional coupons change daily - Customizable ambient music to fit your moodDailyhoroscope.com is part of the Daily Insight Group.

reviews.comment: My experience is the same as the previous reviews. The display is only available in landscape, the various components appear overlaid or accross each other, and my birthdate is displayed as one day prior to the correct one. According to the dates, nothing has changed in 6 months. I won\'t use this.
reviews.author: Rachel Santos

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: App can only be used in landscape mode. Great if you have a tablet, not so much with a phone. Also, you can\'t zoom out to see the whole screen at once. It is too big for the screen, even in landscape so you still have to scroll, but without the ability to pinch zoom, you can\'t use the app. And, there\'s no widget, which means I have to open the app every day when I should be able to just glance at the screen. Will keep looking for a good horoscope app since obviously the developer has abandoned this one.
reviews.author: Ronda Bernstein

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I like how it gives you your moon, sun,  AND ascendant sign...
reviews.author: Dayna Melfi

reviews.title: Awesome except
reviews.comment: There is a glitch where it displays your birthday one day before it actually is. It registers it correctly but displays it wrong so don\'t change it! It says its one day before but its giving an accurate reading! Dont change it or it\'ll be inaccurate even though it displays correctly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goof
reviews.comment: It says the wrong sign for me and the app is too big for my screen. It would be nice if it fit my screen. Other than that, it is aesthetically pleasing and enjoyable to read.
reviews.author: Arec C

reviews.title: Wonderful App!
reviews.comment: Rick & Jeff fan for years. Appreciate their Astrological approach in terms of accurate, self-personalizable, cosmic trends, rather than often inaccurate, earthly specifics. Can\'t say enough good things about this app. May need to be optimized for phones. But, somehow, I enjoy \"Swirling\" through it w/my finger; adds to the \"Scrying\" & \"Inner World\" experience I derive (& enjoy) from it. Displays birth info one day earlier than registered (fix). But, Numerological calcs still accurate. HTC EVO 4G LTE
reviews.author: Jeffrey Kunkel

reviews.title: Fantastic to see this on Android!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a customer of this website for years, have it on igoogle on my desktop too. And so I was thrilled to find this Android app! Thank you so much in making the transit to Android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Roodmv
reviews.comment: Excellent presentation of my daily horoscope! Love it! Looks awesome on my tablet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish I could get more
reviews.comment: I like that it connects online but i wish there was more in the app itself
reviews.author: nicole finch

reviews.title: When you set your birth date, it is off by one day
reviews.comment: When you set your birth date, it is off by one day. For example, if your real birthday is January 1, 1970, your birthday will register as December 31, 1969 when you save your settings! I ended up just adding a day to my birthday to get it to work, but, I\'m not sure this is accurate for the numerology or moon sign info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the Best Android Horoscope Apps I\'ve Tried
reviews.comment: This app is awesome, beautiful, and easy to use. There are so many nice touches and little details, I like that I can get a full overview on my cosmic profile and see my horoscopes for the day (and coming day) as well as get a read on my moon and rising signs. It\'s easy to keep tabs on friends through Facebook, too. And I love Rick and Jeff\'s Planet Pulse videos... This app has become the cornerstone of my morning horoscope ritual! Hard to find free apps that are of such good quality. This is one of them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clumsy attempt at an app
reviews.comment: Image awkwardly bigger than screen size so you have to scroll both horizontal and vertical, displays birth date 1 day before actual inputted birth date, just messy and lame
reviews.author: Jocelyn S

reviews.title: Why force to work landscape
reviews.comment: Very bad ui. Its a website and not a android app.
reviews.author: A Google User
